title: Food Delivery Website
description: A full-stack web application for ordering food. Users can browse various categories, and the admin can manage food types

title: NewsApp-Api-React
description: Created a news platform with 100+ daily articles, categorized by Entertainment, Sports, and General, with infinite scroll and light/dark modes.

title: Startup Pitch Hub
description: A Next.js 15 platform where entrepreneurs submit and explore startup ideas for virtual pitch competitions. Features GitHub auth, live content via Sanity, pitch submission, dynamic browsing and a clean minimal UI.

title: Face Mask Detection
description: Developed a Face Mask Detection system with a CNN model, achieving over 95% training and 94% validation accuracy to enhance public safety.

title: Plant Disease Recognition
description: Developed a Plant Disease Recognition system with TensorFlow, achieving 98.4% training and 97.3% validation accuracy for effective disease identification.
